desc: Acuant provides a seamless workflow for data intake and verification of identity documents to speed up and secure your customer workflows. Whether you need to solve for age or identity verification, border control, patient management or fraud prevention; we have the solution to power trusted transactions.

layout.text:
Welcome to Acuant's new online store!
New and existing customers must create an account before purchasing
Putting the Power of Identity in Your Hands: Data Capture and Identity Verification
